text: I view GitHub as for evolving code and projects - so if you are planning on continually improving something and reusing it then GitHub would make sense. But you do need to be sure to somehow mark what commit is used for the paper for reproducibility purposes (e.g. do a tag/release of the code at that point and reference that).
